article_title: Arguments For Higher Gas Taxes Run On Empty

article_metadata.description: IF YOU WANT TO KNOW what fuels Americans' ire with our political class, just look at the hot new idea percolating in Washington and state capitals: Raise taxes on gasoline! Thanks to a stronger dollar and burgeoning oil inventories, gas prices have plummeted. The typical family may save $550 or more this year, [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes
